inclusion.criterion: Patients (ASA SCORE I-III) without acute cardio-pulmonary decompensation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: who arrive to the ER with shoulder dislocation for reduction maneuver.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient refusal/unable to give informed consent
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with known allergy to medications which will be included in the study
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who suffer additional injuries and need to be hospitalized for further treatment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who received narcotic/sedative premedication before the procedure
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 14-year-old boy with scoliosis and back pain, no other medical condition.
